title: Electroweak corrections to $gg \to HH$: Factorizable contributions
authors: Joshua Davies, Kay Sch\"onwald, Matthias Steinhauser, Hantian Zhang
abstract:
In these proceedings, we consider the factorizable contributions of the
two-loop electroweak corrections to Higgs boson pair production at the Large
Hadron Collider. We discuss the classification of factorizable diagrams and
their renormalization. Compact analytic results for the renormalized form
factors are presented in a computer-readable form.
